artist: Engraver: Guilio Tomba; Painter: After Guercino (Giovanni Francesco Barbieri); Delineator: Francesco Rosaspina
description: St. Peter kneeling in a landscape with a book and a reed(?)in his left hand; a broken sword on ground before him; 2 cherubs upper left
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: [Geo. Franco Barbieri dip.  F. Rosaspina  del.  G. Tomba inc./ S. PIETRO MARTIRE]; on sheet in pencil: [1-508]
title: S. Pietro Martire
